channel.title: [PI] making the ::tele command have tele animation [PI]

item.title: [PI] making the ::tele command have tele animation [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Because you wouldn’t.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("tele")) { try { final String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); c.getPA().startTeleport(Integer.parseInt(args[1]), Integer.parseInt(args[2]), 0, "modern"); } catch (Exception e) { } }

item.title: [PI] making the ::tele command have tele animation [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vazzily Vazzily
item.description:
@Vazzily wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("tele")) { String[] arg = playerCommand.split(" "); if (arg.length > 3) c.getPA().movePlayer(Integer.parseInt(arg[1]),Integer.parseInt(arg[2]),Integer.parseInt(arg[3])); else if (arg.length == 3) c.getPA().movePlayer(Integer.parseInt(arg[1]),Integer.parseInt(arg[2]),c.heightLevel); } 

		[code]c.getPA().startTeleport(3086, 3493, 0, "modern");[/code]

The “modern” is the teleport animation in that case, include it in your “tele” command, there are also tutorials on that.

Read full topic

c.getPA().startTeleport(3086, 3493, 0, "modern");

and compare it with your command.

item.title: [PI] making the ::tele command have tele animation [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

Ok, very simple question.

I have a PI server, when i do ::tele xcoord ycoord it shifts my player to where the x and y coords that i put are.

Here is my code snippit for the ::tele command:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("tele")) { String[] arg = playerCommand.split(" "); if (arg.length > 3) c.getPA().movePlayer(Integer.parseInt(arg[1]),Integer.parseInt(arg[2]),Integer.parseInt(arg[3])); else if (arg.length == 3) c.getPA().movePlayer(Integer.parseInt(arg[1]),Integer.parseInt(arg[2]),c.heightLevel); }

What i want to make it do, is instead of just making my player dissapear and reappear somewhere else, i want it to make my player do the teleport animation.

If it helps, here is the code for my ::home command.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("home") && c.teleBlockLength == 0) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3086, 3493, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Welcome Home."); }

Thx,
mrpopyman

Read full topic
